author: surfersofthemind
title: Giddy Up
review:
Had to get this set for my daughters first christmas.
She has already got her big brothers 50 litre tub of duplo so we had to get something "girly" for her.
The figures in the new duplo sets are more detailed than the last ones and the cart, pony, bush and trough make a great addition to an already overstocked duplo collection.
The cheap price makes it great for a kids surprise, gift or an extra to add to a tub basic blocks.
